title: The Effects of Modafinil and Topiramate on Brain Mechanisms Underlying Cue-induced Cocaine Craving and Dependence in Methadone Maintained Cocaine Dependent Patients.

operands.value: Methadone-maintained cocaine-dependent patients use between 1g to 2g a day; 1 to 3 times a week
Must have minimum age of 20 Years
Must have maximum age of 50 Years
use more than 2g a day; 5 times a week to everyday
Subjects who are diagnosed as suffering from psychotic illness according to DSM-IV (Axis 1)22
history of infection that might affect CNS (HIV, syphilis, cytomegalovirus, herpes)
history of head injury with loss of consciousness

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('Methadone-maintained cocaine-dependent patients use between 1g to 2g a day; 1 to 3 times a week'), Symbol('Must have maximum age of 50 Years'), Symbol('Must have minimum age of 20 Years'), Not(Or(Symbol('Subjects who are diagnosed as suffering from psychotic illness according to DSM-IV (Axis 1)22'), Symbol('history of CNS disease'), Symbol('history of head injury with loss of consciousness'), Symbol('history of infection that might affect CNS (HIV, syphilis, cytomegalovirus, herpes)'), Symbol('pregnant women'), Symbol('use more than 2g a day; 5 times a week to everyday'))))
